title: Catoctin Mountain Park: Places To Go
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go                                                                                                                   Big Hunting Creek                                                                                                                  Kent Walters      Catoctin Mountain Park offers a variety of experiences.  You may wish to start your visit at the park Visitor Center and ask our rangers about different hikes and camping options.  Pick up a park map and discover some of Catoctin's many treasures.  Discover the scenic beauty of the park during all seasons.                                                                                    Whiskey Still, Sawmill and Charcoal Industry                                                                                                                    NPS       Catoctin Mountain Park has cultural treasures to explore, too. The Whiskey Still, Sawmill, and the Charcoal and Iron Industries are all featured along trails with wayside exhibits.
